name: Silly Games
description:
Jacob is hopelessly and desperately in love with his best friend Charlie. He manages by pining from afar, but unfortunately, those feelings finally overwhelm him and cause him to do the unthinkable: one day, while Charlie isn't aware, he kidnaps him! How will Charlie deal with Jacob’s feelings for him? And…will he return them at last?

Silly Games is a text-based adventure novel, where you choose your own ending while playing as Charlie. There is a total of 9 endings to get, with 5 bad endings and 4 good endings. This game contains over 10,000 words and takes less than an hour to finish fully. 

Silly Games is also cross-posted from Wattpad with different names and mild edits to the story to enhance it. 

We hope you enjoy the story!

For more post-game content:

Check out our short story quiz! Will Charlie be able to have a successful dinner date? Let's find out in Silly Games 1.5: The Sillying.  It is highly recommended to play this only after completing all the endings. 

Content Warnings: 

Stockholm syndrome, violence, abuse, manipulation, softcore torture, blood, maiming, dubcon (kissing only), suffocation, mentions of experimentation and mass murder, mutilation, chemical burns, mentions of stalking
